excerpt: "Who will be liable for harmful speech generated by large language models? As advanced AIs such as OpenAI's GPT-3 are being cheered for impressive breakthroughs in natural language processing and generation -- and all sorts of (productive) applications for the tech are envisaged from slicker copywriting to more capable customer service chatbots -- the risks of such powerful text-generating tools inadvertently automating abuse and spreading smears can't be ignored."
